version_description: Bug fixes and improvements.
Bug fixes and improvements.

Introducing Customers, a tool that gives you greater insight into your customer base.

With Customers, you can:

• See key insights about each customer, such as average order value, order history, and more
• Organize your customers us

Introducing Customers, a tool that gives you greater insight into your customer base.

With Customers, you can:

• See key insights about each customer, such as average order value, order history, and more
• Organize your customers us

Manage your discounts directly from your mobile device. With this version, you can:
• View, edit and share your discounts
• Create new discounts
• See how many times your discounts have been used, and which ones are active, scheduled, or expired

Manage your discounts directly from your mobile device. With this version, you can:
• View, edit and share your discounts
• Create new discounts
• See how many times your discounts have been used, and which ones are active, scheduled, or expired

• Updated look for managing and fulfilling orders
• Resolved an issue that prevented users from scanning some USPS barcodes

• Updated look for managing and fulfilling orders
• Resolved an issue that prevented users from scanning some USPS barcodes

Introducing Automatic Discounts. Automatic Discounts lets you to create discounts that apply automatically in checkout, no code required. For example, you can create a discount that automatically gives your customers free shipping on orders over $75. This

Introducing Automatic Discounts. Automatic Discounts lets you to create discounts that apply automatically in checkout, no code required. For example, you can create a discount that automatically gives your customers free shipping on orders over $75. This
Bug fixes and improvements
Bug fixes and improvements
Fix for issue when adjusting inventory.
Fix for issue when adjusting inventory.

Sort your Orders and Customers in ways that are most useful to your workflow. With this release, you can now view your list of orders by the newest or oldest ones and your list of customers alphabetically or by the last order date.

Sort your Orders and Customers in ways that are most useful to your workflow. With this release, you can now view your list of orders by the newest or oldest ones and your list of customers alphabetically or by the last order date.
Improvements to carrier detection and app login.
Improvements to carrier detection and app login.
Fix for unlimited stock levels showing for all products/variants.
Fix for unlimited stock levels showing for all products/variants.
Introducing support for gift cards, our latest feature available in the Commerce Advanced plan. View gift card orders and orders where gift cards have been applied as a payment method.
Introducing support for gift cards, our latest feature available in the Commerce Advanced plan. View gift card orders and orders where gift cards have been applied as a payment method.
Ready for the new iPhone X.
Ready for the new iPhone X.

In the Customers tab, you can now see customers with accounts alongside their purchase history to identify purchasing trends.

Ring in the new year with iOS features that make it even easier to take action from your device.
- Quickly access your orders, inventory, and discounts by using 3D Touch to jump to these screens. Press down on the app icon to find these shortcuts. 3D T

Introducing Limited-Use Discounts, the latest feature available in the Commerce Advanced plan. With this feature, you can limit a discount to one use per customer or limit the total number of uses.

Whether you’re having a flash sale, sending promo

Introducing Limited-Use Discounts, the latest feature available in the Commerce Advanced plan. With this feature, you can limit a discount to one use per customer or limit the total number of uses.

Bug fixes and improvements.
Bug fixes and improvements.

With this release, you can edit more product details on the go. In addition to editing stock and scheduling or hiding products, you can now:
• Rearrange, delete, and upload new images
• Edit product names
• Edit product descriptions

Look

With this release, you can edit more product details on the go. In addition to editing stock and scheduling or hiding products, you can now:
• Rearrange, delete, and upload new images
• Edit product names
• Edit product descriptions

Look

We've updated our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy to keep pace with our growing international user base and expanded product offerings, address new requirements under GDPR, and ensure we continue to be transparent about our practices. This release all

Add tags and categories to organize your products, straight from your device. Categories create a navigation for shoppers to find products on your website, and tags can help optimize your site’s search results.
